Sentencas: The coarsening of Ni in Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anodes is a potential cause of long term solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) performance degradation.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The specifics of the Ni-YSZ structure-including Ni/YSZ ratio, porosity, and particle size distributions-are normally selected to minimize anode polarization resistance, but they also impact long-term stability.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: A better understanding of how these factors influence long-term stability is important for designing more durable anodes.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The effect of structural details, e.g., Ni-YSZ ratio, on Ni coarsening has not been quantified.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Furthermore, prior measurements have been done by comparing evolved structures with control samples, such that sample-to-sample variations introduce errors.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Here, we report a four dimensional (three spatial dimensions and time) study of Ni coarsening in Ni-YSZ anode functional layers with different Ni/YSZ ratios, using synchrotron x-ray nano-tomography.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The continuous structural evolution was observed and analyzed at sub-100 nm resolution.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: It is shown quantitatively that increasing the Ni/YSZ ratio increases the Ni coarsening rate.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: This is due to both increased pore volume and a decrease in the YSZ volume fraction, such that there is more free volume and a less obtrusive YSZ network, both of which allow greater Ni coarsening.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The results are shown to be in good agreement with a power-law coarsening model.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: The finding is critical for informing the design of SOFC electrode microstructures that limit coarsening and performance degradation.
Titulo: Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
Effect of Ni content on the morphological evolution of Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
